ships.name: TIE-Fighter
ships.description: Carried aboard Star Destroyers and battle stations, TIE fighters were single-pilot vehicles designed for fast-paced dogfights with Rebel X-wings and other starfighters.

ships.name: X-Wing
ships.description: The X-wing is a versatile Rebel Alliance starfighter that balances speed with firepower.

ships.name: Delta Shuttle
ships.description: The Delta-class T-3c shuttle was originally designed as a side project by Sienar Fleet Systems and was not intended for production.

ships.name: Millennium Falcon
ships.description: The Millennium Falcon is a legend in smuggler circles and is coveted by many for being the fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy.

ships.name: Acclamator
ships.description: The Acclamator-class assault transport was 752 meters long, 460 meters in width, and 200 meters in height.

ships.name: Tantive IV
ships.description: Both Bail Organa and his adopted daughter Leia used this Alderaanian starship on public missions for the Senate and secret ones for the Alliance.

ships.name: Rendili StarDrive
ships.description: Rendili StarDrive's light corvette was the backbone of this force.

ships.name: Snowspeeder
ships.description: The Rebel Alliance modified T-47 airspeeders to become snowspeeders, fast flying conveyances for patrol and defense of their hidden base.
